name: Magnifier
tagline: Built using HTML5 canvas element and Javascript (jQuery) and CSS.
body:
Magnifier is a code snippet which can be used on E-commerce websites to magnify products.Built using HTML5 canvas element and Javascript (jQuery) and CSS.

![alt tag](https://raw.github.com/akshaynagpal/magnifier/master/mag1.png)

Screenshot of the Magnifier.
